definition: alkaline earth (i.e. beryllium Be 鈹|铍, magnesium Mg 鎂|镁, calcium Ca 鈣|钙, strontium Sr 鍶|锶, barium Ba 鋇|钡 and radium Ra 鐳|镭)
earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
category/genus (taxonomy)/family members/dependents/to belong to/subordinate to/affiliated with/be born in the year of (one of the 12 animals)/to be/to prove to be/to constitute
to join together/to fix one's attention on/to concentrate on

sentences.english: The calculated results of energy gap on alkaline earth mixed halides are reasonable.
sentences.chinese: 对碱土金属复卤化物的能隙进行了计算，结果合理。

sentences.english: It does not absorb the alkaline-earth metal ions and behave as the polyamine resins.
sentences.chinese: 但不吸附碱土金属离子，这和聚多胺树脂相同。

sentences.english: The crystal structures of alkali-earth metal dihydrogen diphthalates have been measured.
sentences.chinese: 测定了碱土金属邻苯二甲酸氢盐的晶体结构。

sentences.english: The article discusses the thickening mechanism of unsaturated polyesters with alkaline-earth metallic oxide.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了碱土金属氧化物对不饱和聚酯的增稠机理。

sentences.english: The alkaline-earth metal strontium is the smallest element in abundance for the silver-white soft metal.
sentences.chinese: 锶是碱土金属中丰度最小的元素，为银白色软金属。

sentences.english: By two alkyl halide with alkali metal or alkaline earth metal polysulfides from condensation.
sentences.chinese: 由二卤代烷与碱金属或碱土金属的多硫化物缩聚而成。

definition: simple substance (consisting purely of one element, such as diamond)
alkali salt (soda, lye, calcium carbonate etc)
